title: Open records request for ISD staffing information (Cypress-fairbanks Independent School District)

communications.communication:
Good afternoon,

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I am requesting the following information:

A list of every employee who left the Cypress-fairbanks Independent School District between August 1, 2021 and December 31, 2023.

For each employee, I am requesting 
• Employee’s name
• Their hire date
• The date they left your school district
• Their job title
• Their organizational unit/campus 
• The reason for the separation

I’m requesting the information be sent electronically in an Excel or spreadsheet format.

Sincerely,

Sarah Rafique

title: Oak Forest USPS Investigationbs (U.S. Postal Inspection Service)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All US Postal Inspector and US Postal Service Office of Inspector General incident and investigation reports from 01/01/2020 to 01/01/2024 that contain the following address that is in Houston, Texas:

2499 Judiway St
Houston, TX 77018

This request is for both internal investigations into USPS staff as well as incidents and investigations not involving USPS employees.

Many thanks,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kevin Ozebek

title: Oak Forest USPS Investigationbs (United States Postal Service, Office of Inspector General)
